content: this blanket is worked from the center out in rounds **finished measurements** diameter 48 **gauge ** rnds 1-2 = 2¾ diameter save time check your gauge **materials ** premier® yarns bloom® chunky big 100% acrylic 7oz/200g 200m/218 yds 2035-04 tulip 4 balls - or - premier® yarns bloom® chunky 100% acrylic 3 5oz/100g 100m/109 yds 1114-14 tulip 8 balls **hooks & notions ** us size l-11 8 mm or size needed to obtain gauge **skills/techniques used in this pattern ** chain slip stitches and double_crochet stitches magic_ring working in rounds tapestry needle
